note:
Retired. Careers have spanned Legal, Computer Training, Advertising and Public Service. I was a litigation secretary, moved to computer training when our law firm's trainer noticed I had a knack for it, then to advertising (support roles), and finally ended my work life as a Senior Communications Advisor with a provincial government agency responsible for advertising procurement.
Curious about the world and how others experience it. Open to new thoughts and perspectives. Hopeful for the future.
